FrontalCortex.comments: merges: superiorfrontal (1028, 2028), rostralmiddlefrontal (1027, 2027), caudalmiddlefrontal (1003, 2003), parsopercularis (1018, 2018), parstriangularis (1020, 2020), parsorbitalis (1019, 2019), precental (1024, 2024), paracentral (1017, 2017), frontalpole (1032, 2032).  See https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation

CingulateCortex.comments: merges: rostralanteriorcingulate (1026, 2026), caudalanteriorcingulate (1002, 2002), posteriorcingulate (1023, 2023), isthmuscingulate: (1010, 2010). See https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation

TemporalCortex.comments: merges: inferiortemporal (1009, 2009), middletemporal (1015, 2015), superiortemporal (1030, 2030), fusiform (1007, 2007), transversetemporal (1034, 2034), entorhinal (1006, 2006), temporalpole (1033, 2033), parahippocampal (1016, 2016). See https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation

OccipitalCortex.comments: merges: lateraloccipital (1011, 2011), lingual (1013, 2013), cuneus (1005, 2005) and pericalcarine (1021, 2021).  See https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation

ParietalCortex.comments: merges: inferiorparietal (1008, 2008), superiorparietal (1029, 2029), supramarginal (1031, 2031), postcentral (1022, 2022), precuneus (1025, 2025).  See https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation

Cerebellum.comments: Not including Cerebellum White matter; thats another category that is ignored due to noise
